name: Iron Crusher
description: Attack a single enemy. Ignores 50% defense vs armored targets. Grants +50 potency vs armored targets.

name: Heavy Slash
description: Attack a single enemy with high potency.

name: Lean Edge
description: Attack a single enemy. Recover 25% HP if attack hits and another 25% HP if target is defeated.

name: Vertical Edge
description: Attack a single enemy. Against flying targets, becomes Truestrike, +50 Potency and ignores 50% of Defense.

name: Long Thrust
description: Attack a column of enemies with a piercing strike. Cavalry targets cannot guard against this attack. Grants +50 potency vs cavalry targets.

name: Javelin
description: Attack a single enemy. +50 potency vs flying targets.

name: Brandish
description: Attack a single enemy. Ignores 50% of the target's defense. Grants the user +1 PP if the attack hits.

name: Sanguine Attack
description: Attack a single enemy. Recover HP equal to 50% of damage dealt.

name: Shadow Thrust
description: Attack a column of enemies. Inflicts blindness.

name: Magic Attack
description: Attack a single enemy with magical damage.

name: True Thrust
description: Attack a column of enemies. This attack always hits.

name: Passive Shatter
description: Attack a column of enemies. Inflicts -1 PP.

name: Phantom Attack
description: Attack a single enemy with magical damage. Inflicts -1 PP.

name: Lightning Shaker
description: Attack a row of enemies. Inflicts stun.

name: Icicle Dart
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts freeze.

name: Rampage
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts -1 AP on target and grants user -50% Defense.

name: Lethal Venom
description: Attack a column of enemies with a piercing strike. Inflicts Poison. Inflicts Deathblow vs. poisoned foes.

name: Flame Javelin
description: Attack a single enemy. +50 potency vs. flying targets. Inflicts burn.

name: Elfslayer
description: Attack a column of enemies. Inflicts -1 AP, -1 PP and -50% Defense to Elven targets.

name: Thunderous Thrust
description: Attack a single enemy with hybrid damage. Inflicts stun. +25 potency if user has Faeries.

name: Dragoon Dive
description: Attack all enemies. Requires charging. +50 potency vs ground targets.

name: Warding Slash
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants the user +20% Phys. Defense.

name: Shield Bash
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Stun.

name: Defender
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants the user +50% Phys. Defense. Grants the user +1 PP if this attack hits.

name: Honed Spear
description: Attack a column of enemies with a piercing strike. +50 potency if the user is buffed. Cavalry targets cannot guard against this attack.

name: Smash
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Phys. Defense -20%.

name: Rolling Axe
description: Attack a row of enemies with multiple hits. Inflicts Phys. Defense -15%.

name: Wide Breaker
description: Attack a row of enemies. Inflicts Phys. Defense -30%. +50 potency v. debuffed targets.

name: Keen Edge
description: Attack a single enemy with a critical strike. (Critical rate +50%)

name: Impale
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants the user +1 PP if the target is defeated.

name: Meteor Slash
description: Attack a single enemy with a critical flurry. (Critical rate +30%.)

name: Killing Chain
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants the user +1 AP if the target is defeated.

name: Bastard's Cross
description: Attack a single enemy. Potency increases based on the target's HP. (Maximum increase: +60.)

name: Sting
description: Attack a single enemy. +50 potency if the user is below 50% HP.

name: Row Protection
description: Grants allies in the user's row +50% Phys. Defense.

name: Greatshield
description: Grants the user +50% Phys. Defense and +2 PP.

name: Wide Smash
description: Attack a row of enemies. +50 potency if the user is at 100% HP.

name: Mounting Charge
description: Restore 30% HP to the user. Grants the user +30% Phys. Attack.

name: Grand Smash
description: Attack all enemies. +50 potency if the user is at 100% HP.

name: Heavy Smash
description: Attack a single enemy. Ignores 100% Defense v. armored targets.

name: Assaulting Blow
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants the user +1 AP if the target is defeated.

name: Row Smash
description: Attack a row of enemies. Ignores 100% Defense v. armored targets.

name: Single Shot
description: Attack a single enemy.

name: Dual Shot
description: Attack two enemies.

name: Row Shot
description: Attack a row of enemies.

name: Power Bolt
description: Attack a single enemy with a powerful ranged strike.

name: Toxic Bolt
description: Attack a single enemy with a poisoned bolt. Inflicts poison.

name: Heavy Bolt
description: Attack a single enemy with a heavy crossbow bolt. +100 potency if user is in the front row.

name: Passive Steal
description: Attack a single enemy. Steal all of the enemy's PP. (Does not apply if they guard the first hit.)

name: Toxic Throw
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Poison.

name: Shadowbite
description: Attack a row of enemies. Inflicts Blindness. Inflicts Initiative -20 and Evasion -20.

name: Active Steal
description: Attack a single enemy. Steal 1 of the enemy's AP. (Does not apply if they guard the first hit.)

name: Assaulting Lance
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants the user +1 AP if the target is defeated.

name: Wild Rush
description: Attack a column of enemies with a piercing strike. Inflicts Stun.

name: Pile Thrust
description: Attack a single target with multiple hits. Grants the user +1 AP if the target is defeated.

name: Hache
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants the user +1 PP if this attack hits.

name: Row Heal
description: Restore moderate HP to a row of allies.

name: Saint's Blade
description: Attack a single enemy. +25 potency if the user is at 100% HP. Grants the user +1 PP if this attack hits.

name: Vengeful Axe
description: Attacks a single enemy. Damage increases the less HP the user has. (Maximum increase: +100.)

name: Venom Axe
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Poison.

name: Dark Flame
description: Consumes 30% of own HP to attack a row of enemies. +50 potency v. debuffed targets. Inflicts Burn.

name: Heal
description: Restore moderate HP to an ally.

name: Sacred Heal
description: Restore moderate HP to a row of allies. Removes all of target's debuffs.

name: Passive Curse
description: Inflicts -1 PP and -10 Initiative on a row of enemies.

name: Offensive Curse
description: Inflicts -50% Phys. Attack and -50% Mag. Attack on a row of enemies.

name: Defensive Curse
description: Inflicts -50% Phys. Defense, -50% Mag. Defense, and Guard Seal on a row of enemies.

name: Compounding Curse
description: Makes Debuffs 1.5x more effective for a row of enemies.

name: Fireball
description: Attack a single enemy with Magic. Inflicts Burn

name: Thunderous Strike
description: Attack a row of enemies with Magic. Inflicts Stun.

name: Volcano
description: Attack a column of enemies with Magic. Inflicts Burn.

name: Icebolt
description: Attack a single enemy with Magic. Inflicts Freeze.

name: Magic Missile
description: Attack two enemies with Magic.

name: Ice Coffin
description: Attack a row of enemies with Magic. Inflicts Freeze.

name: Diving Thrust
description: Attack a single enemy. Cavalry targets cannot guard against this attack. +50 potency vs Cavalry targets.

name: Fire Breath
description: Attack a row of enemies. Inflicts Burn.

name: Tempest Dive
description: Attack a column of enemies with a piercing strike. Cavalry targets cannot guard against this attack. Becomes a truestrike and critical if user is below 50% HP.

name: High Swing
description: Attack a row of enemies. Cavalry targets cannot guard against this attack. +50 potency vs Cavalry targets.

name: Fatal Dive
description: Attack a column of enemies with a piercing strike. Deals damage equal to 50% of the user's HP. This attack cannot be a critical.

name: Aerial Smite
description: Attack a row of enemies. Cavalry targets cannot guard against this attack. -1 AP to targets at 100% HP.

name: Lightning Blade
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Stun.

name: Nature's Wrath
description: Attack a column of enemies with piercing Magic. Inflicts -1 PP to Cavalry targets.

name: Mirage Stab
description: Attack a row of enemies. Grants the user the ability to Evade one attack.

name: Wind Arrow
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Evasion -50.

name: Mystic Conferral
description: Add Magic damage (50 potency) to an ally's attacks.

name: Icicle Arrow
description: Attack two enemies. Inflicts Freeze.

name: Finishing Stab
description: Attack a single enemy. Grants the user +50% Phys. Attack if the target is defeated.

name: Decimate
description: Attack a single enemy. Potency increases the fewer enemies there are. (Maximum increase +100.)

name: Wild Fang
description: Attack a row of enemies. Potency increases the less HP a target has. (Maximum increase +50.)

name: Piercing Lance
description: Attack a single of enemy. Inflicts Guard Seal.

name: Passive Hold
description: Attack a single of enemy. Inflicts Passive Seal.

name: Venom Thrust
description: Attack a column of enemies with a piercing strike. Inflicts Poison and debuffs target HP recovery by -50%. +50 potency vs Poisoned targets.

name: Bear Crush
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Stun.

name: Round Swing
description: Attack a row enemies. Damage increases the more HP the user has (Maximum increase +50.)

name: Earthshaker
description: Attack all enemies. Damage increases the less HP the user has (Maximum increase +75.)

name: Aurora Veil
description: Grants HP regeneration to a row of allies. Grants targets +50% Mag. Defense.

name: Night Vision
description: Grants a row of allies +50 Accuracy. At Night, makes the targets' next attack a Truestrike.

name: Extra heal
description: Restore moderate HP to an ally. Grants HP regeneration and +30 Initiative.

name: Spiral Sword
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Evasion -20. Graths the user +20 Evasion.

name: Shield Smite
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Defense -20%. Graths the user +20% Defense.

name: Honed Slash
description: Attack a single enemy. Becomes a truestrike if the user is buffed.

name: Delaying Shot
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts Initiative -20.

name: Saint's Shot
description: Attack a single enemy. Inflicts -1 PP. Additional -1 PP to ground-based targets.

name: Photon Arrow
description: Attack two enemies. Inflicts Physical Defense -50%. Inflicts Guard Seal during the Day.
